name: Heal Palestine
mission: Sheltering Program provides immediate, practical protection for families who have nowhere else to go.
theoryOfChange: Healing happens through four pillars (Health, Aid, Education, Leadership) to provide both urgent lifesaving care and sustainable long-term career and health outcomes.

all_citations.claim: HEAL Palestine provides immediate protection and sheltering for families through aid programs and maintains high financial efficiency.
The charity is zakat-eligible and follows specific policies for asnaf categories.
The organization reported total revenue of $20,223,260, a program expense ratio of 88.2%, and working capital of 17.8 months.
The organization offers various donation options and giving methods for humanitarian support.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a strong score due to its direct service model in a high-urgency humanitarian zone and its exceptional financial efficiency metrics.
areas_for_improvement: As a relatively new entity, establishing a multi-year longitudinal impact study could further validate long-term outcomes
Expanding third-party transparency ratings as the organization matures

dimension_explanations.alignment: The organization shows high alignment for humanitarian-focused donors, specifically those seeking zakat-eligible opportunities to support urgent needs in Palestine [2][4]. Its mission to provide practical protection for families with nowhere else to go addresses a critical humanitarian gap [1].
dimension_explanations.impact: HEAL Palestine demonstrates high impact through direct service delivery, including bakery operations and food parcel distribution, with a program expense ratio of 88.2% [1][3]. The charity maintains a robust financial position with 17.8 months of working capital, ensuring stability for its sheltering and support programs [3].

baseline_narrative.headline: HEAL Palestine Inc. provides urgent humanitarian relief and sheltering for families in Gaza through high-efficiency aid programs.
strengths: High program expense ratio of 88.2% ensures the vast majority of funds reach beneficiaries
Exceptional fundraising efficiency with a cost of only $0.01 per $1 raised
Strong liquidity with 17.8 months of working capital
baseline_narrative.summary: HEAL Palestine Inc. is a humanitarian organization dedicated to providing immediate protection, food security, and sheltering for displaced families [1]. The organization is recognized as zakat-eligible, allowing Muslim donors to fulfill their religious obligations through specific aid categories [2].

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who want to provide immediate, zakat-eligible humanitarian relief to Palestinian families through a highly efficient, direct-service organization.
donor_motivations: Want to fulfill zakat obligations with confidence for Palestinian relief
Prioritize organizations with extremely low fundraising costs
Value direct service delivery in active crisis zones
giving_considerations: Operates in highly volatile conflict zones
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking organizations with decades of historical impact data or those focused on domestic US programs.

impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: Provides immediate, practical protection and sheltering for families who have nowhere else to go.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Evidence ensures that rapid humanitarian response translates into meaningful, life-saving outcomes for displaced families.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: The scale of the humanitarian crisis in Gaza far exceeds current global response capacity.

strengths.detail: The organization maintains a strong <cite id="1">88.2% program expense ratio</cite>, ensuring the vast majority of funds directly support humanitarian relief.
HEAL Palestine demonstrates remarkable cost-effectiveness in its development efforts, spending only <cite id="1">$0.01 per $1 raised</cite>.
The charity holds <cite id="1">17.8 months of working capital</cite>, providing significant operational stability during crises.

strengths_deep_dive: HEAL Palestine's financial model is built for maximum impact in crisis zones. By maintaining an <cite id="1">88.2% program expense ratio</cite>, the organization ensures that donor contributions are efficiently converted into direct aid. This is complemented by an incredibly lean fundraising operation that costs just <cite id="1">$0.01 per $1 raised</cite>. Furthermore, the organization's <cite id="2">zakat-eligible status</cite> allows it to effectively channel obligatory Islamic alms directly to vulnerable populations in Gaza and surrounding areas.
rich_narrative.summary: HEAL Palestine Inc. is a rapidly growing humanitarian organization founded in <cite id="3">2024</cite> to provide urgent relief and sheltering for displaced families. Operating primarily in <cite id="4">Gaza, the West Bank, and Cairo</cite>, the organization focuses on health, aid, education, and leadership programs. Despite its recent establishment, HEAL Palestine has mobilized significant resources, generating <cite id="3">$20,223,260 in total revenue</cite> to support its critical mission. The organization demonstrates strong financial efficiency, directing <cite id="1">88.2% to program expenses</cite>, ensuring the vast majority of donor funds reach beneficiaries directly. Furthermore, it operates with exceptional fundraising efficiency, spending just <cite id="1">$0.01 per $1 raised</cite>. For Muslim donors, the organization is <cite id="2">verified as zakat-eligible</cite>, accepting funds for multiple asnaf categories including fuqara and masakin. The charity maintains a robust financial safety net with <cite id="1">17.8 months of working capital</cite>, providing stability in volatile operating environments. HEAL Palestine tracks <cite id="1">8 outcome metrics</cite> through its Platinum Candid profile, demonstrating a commitment to transparency and impact measurement in its direct service delivery model.
